body: [{"lon":23.4162,"lat":-15.7801,"blurb":"Africa is a continent located south of Europe and bordered by the Atlantic Ocean to the west, the Indian Ocean to the east, and the Mediterranean Sea to the north. It is the second-largest continent in the world and is home to a diverse range of cultures, languages, and ecosystems. Environmental concerns in Africa include deforestation, desertification, and the loss of biodiversity."},{"lon":28.0473,"lat":-26.2041,"blurb":"Johannesburg, South Africa is one of the largest cities on the continent and is a major economic hub. The city faces environmental challenges such as air pollution, water scarcity, and waste management. Efforts are being made to address these issues through sustainable development and green initiatives."},{"lon":32.5732,"lat":-25.9605,"blurb":"Durban, South Africa is a coastal city known for its beaches and warm climate. The city faces environmental challenges such as coastal erosion, water pollution, and waste management. Efforts are being made to address these issues through sustainable development and conservation initiatives."}]
